item.title: How to Start a Cybersecurity Career (Even with No Experience)
item.description: Learn how to build a job-ready cybersecurity profile, what skills to focus on, which certifications actually matter, and how to get noticed by companies.

item.title: Is Cybersecurity the Right Major for You?
item.description: A practical introduction to the cybersecurity major for students and parents. Learn what to expect, how it's taught in universities, and the real career opportunities behind it.

item.description: Learn how websites work, then practice hacking them safely and legally using real-world tools and techniques in a structured 4-week program.
